content:
A few thousand people showed up to the lawn of Phi Kappa Psi Monday night to protest an alleged sexual assault that happened at the Phi Kappa Psi house over the weekend PERIOD

A few thousand people showed up to the lawn of Phi Kappa Psi Monday night to protest an alleged sexual assault that happened at the Phi Kappa Psi house over the weekend PERIOD

By the official start time of the protest at  p.m. thousands were already protesting PERIOD

The Lawrence Police Department were blocking off the roads at Daisy Hill and the engineering building PERIOD People were on the lawn chanting with signs PERIOD

The Phi Kappa Psi national chapter released a statement Monday night regarding the situation stating that they were aware of the situation and that a full investigation and complete investigation was being launched PERIOD

 the statement said PERIOD 

The Kansan reached out to university spokesperson Erinn BarcombPeterson for comment PERIOD

 BarcombPeterson said PERIOD 

There were also people across the street watching PERIOD People were chanting no means no f phi psi and kick him out. a group of protestors stormed the front porch of the Phi Kappa Psi house and were pepper sprayed by a police officer PERIOD

This is a developing story and will be updated PERIOD

title: BREAKING: Thousands protest Phi Kappa Psi after sexual assault allegation | News | kansan.com
